content.raw:
Ok so I added a context menu(the code isn't nice and clean I'll refactor later) and the code seems to be quite simple, but for some reason line l1822 seems to not work.

```
#!python

action = copy_menu.addAction(filename, lambda: self.on_groups_copy_selected_groups_triggered(str(filepath)))

```
All actions are linked to the same filename(last in the list) and I don't know why. Any Ideas?

Update: Fixed it!
